# Directory introduction

This directory contains a directory named hg19 used in the single cell example.

The hg19 directory contains three files: barcodes.tsv, genes.tsv, matrix.mtx.

barcodes.tsv, genes.tsv, matrix.mtx: The single-cell transcriptomic data used in this study was derived from PBMC (Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cell) samples and can be obtained from the following source: https://cf.10xgenomics.com/samples/cell/pbmc3k/pbmc3k_filtered_gene_bc_matrices.tar.gz.

# Data link
```{r echo=FALSE}
library(fs)
x <- dir_info('examples/single_cell/filtered_gene_bc_matrices/',
    recurse = TRUE, invert = TRUE, regexp = "[.]html$")[, 1:3] |>
    as.data.frame()
x_link <- gsub(x$path,
  pattern = "examples/single_cell/filtered_gene_bc_matrices/",
  replacement = ""
)
x$path <- sprintf("[%s](%s)", x_link, x_link)

knitr::kable(x, row.names = FALSE)
```
